name: Sky-Caper
description:
Sky-Caper, set in the not-too-distant future, is a game in which you, the world's greatest thief, scale a dangerous skyscraper filled with cameras, motion detectors, guards, and other traps. Your goal? To obtain a new gadget prototype, the only one of its kind, which will make the user impossible to detect. A difficult task, but you have many tools at your disposal. The skyscraper is filled with plentiful gadgets, each with its own unique ability, which will allow you a variety of approaches for getting past each floor. Do you have what it takes to become the ultimate thief in this challenging 2D Stealth Platformer?

Features

  • Challenging stealth levels with a number of ways to approach each challenge
  • A wide variety of gadgets to help you traverse levels and sneak around undetected
  • Smart guards, who respond to any disturbance and patrol in search of intruders
  • Unique areas with their own themes and challenges
